function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases through the use of shared sensing network and IoT devices in the hospital environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection among patients and healthcare workers.","Mitigation":"Implement strict cleaning and disinfection protocols for the IoT devices and sensing network. Provide training on hygiene and infection control for hospital staff.","Technologies":"Disinfection technologies for IoT devices, UV-C light sterilization, and antimicrobial coatings for surfaces.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors.","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control team."},{"Description":"Risk of unauthorized access to sensitive patient data due to the interconnected nature of the proposed e-Health framework.","Impact":"Potential breach of patient privacy, exposure of sensitive medical information.","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust encryption and access control measures, regular security audits and updates to the framework.","Technologies":"Strong encryption algorithms, multi-factor authentication, and secure communication protocols.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, system administrators.","Owner":"IT security team, hospital management."},{"Description":"Possible risk of data tampering or corruption in the decentralized storage and exchange of medical information using blockchain technology.","Impact":"Compromised integrity of medical records, inaccurate treatment decisions based on tampered data.","Mitigation":"Implement data verification mechanisms, cryptographic hashing of medical records, and regular integrity checks of stored information.","Technologies":"Blockchain consensus algorithms, cryptographic hashing algorithms, and data validation protocols.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, blockchain administrators.","Owner":"Blockchain administrators, IT security team."}]}
